summary: TAKATA RECALL... I CAN'T SEEM TO FIND AN AUTHORIZED MERCEDES DEALERSHIP HERE IN HAWAII THAT HAS THE PARTS TO FIX MY RECALL. I'M AM PREGNANT AND HAVE CHILDREN AND WANT THIS FIXED. I DON'T WANT TO WAIT UNTIL SOMETHING HAPPENS BEFORE IT GETS FIXED . IT WILL BE A BAD ENDING FOR EVERYONE INVOLVED.
